tool_description: Natural language API to extract nutrition data from any text. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/nutrition.
title: Nutrition by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/nutrition

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query text to extract nutrition information (e.g. **bacon and 3 eggs**).

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the nutritional information for a cheeseburger with a side of onion rings?

parameters.query: cheeseburger with a side of onion rings

utterances.utterance: What's the nutrition breakdown for a bowl of chicken noodle soup?
I'd like to know the nutritional content of a large pepperoni pizza.
Can you tell me the nutrition facts for a serving of spaghetti carbonara?
What are the nutrition details for a breakfast of pancakes with maple syrup?
Please provide the nutritional information for a Caesar salad with grilled chicken.
I'd like to know the nutrition facts for a cup of black coffee and a croissant.

parameters.query: cup of black coffee and a croissant

utterances.utterance: Can you give me the nutritional breakdown for a turkey sandwich with lettuce and tomato?

parameters.query: turkey sandwich with lettuce and tomato

utterances.utterance: What's the nutrition information for a serving of beef stew with potatoes?

parameters.query: serving of beef stew with potatoes

utterances.utterance: Please tell me the nutritional content of a slice of chocolate cake.
